name: Two Doors
description:
You're in a dungeon and you need to escape. Lucky for you, there are two doors. One door sends you all the way back to the start, the other let's you go to the next door and do the same "puzzle" again. Can you get lucky enough to make it through all of the doors? 

This was a project for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. This took about 6 hours to make.

(It's also unintentionally hard)
